entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:39 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Periods of drizzle beginning this evening changing to periods of rain later this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. High 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
